import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styles/PopForm.css' import userFrame from '../icons/frame.png' import downarrw from '../icons/arrow-down.png' export default function dropDown(props ){ const title=props.role? props.role:'Select Role' const options=props.options.map(square => (
  • )) return(
    {title}
    • ios Developer
